entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. A few rain showers or flurries beginning late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low zero. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
